body.raw:
{
    "title": "Backend Developer",
    "description": "We’re now looking for a Developer (can be remote or onsite) to work with us, as an architect and builder, developing and maintaining our online shop and community. You’ll be a builder and fundamental team member, with a voice on the course of the company, not just another cog in a machine",
    "skills": ["nodejs", "express", "mongodb", "swagger"],
    "companyMarket": "Software House",
    "companyName": "Taikai",
    "type": "Full Time",
    "location": {
        "planet": "Eatrh",
        "country": "Portugal",
        "city": "Porto"
    },
    "companyWebsite": "https://taikai.network/en",
    "responsabilities": [
        "Develop new functionality and features",
        "Think about architecture and infrastructure solutions",
        "Implement design and front-end changes"
    ],
    "announcedBy": {
        "name": "Hélder",
        "email": "helder@taikai.com",
        "role": "CTO"
    }
}
